pr_title: Add endpoint to delete a service provider by ID

timeline.message:
Add endpoint to delete a service provider by ID

This API is a sibling to the existing Put SAML Service Provider API
that registers a new SP.

The implementation is a hard delete.

timeline.body: Should we also handle refresh policy here ( pass the one from the request ) ?
timeline.bodyText: Should we also handle refresh policy here ( pass the one from the request ) ?
timeline.bodyHTML: Should we also handle refresh policy here ( pass the one from the request ) ?
timeline.author: jkakavas

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
logger.debug("Deleteed service provider document [{}] ({})", version.id, response.getResult());
logger.debug("Deleted service provider document [{}] ({})", version.id, response.getResult());
timeline.author: jkakavas
